title: Fresh Air Remembers '60 Minutes' Correspondent Bob Simon
teaser: Simon was killed in a car accident Wednesday. He was 73. He was a CBS reporter for nearly 50 years. In 1991, he was detained by Iraqi soldiers. He talked with guest host Marty Moss Coane in 1992.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
